summary: Replaces weapon/armor upgrade names with numbers
descriptionHtml:
Overview:
Just a very basic mod that changes how upgraded items are named. Some items\' names were getting too long to fit comfortably in the limited amount of space, so I replaced the words with a simple D&D styled number system. Unfortunately, this does not remove the parentheses.

Details:
+1 :: Fine
+2 :: Superior
+3 :: Exquisite
+4 :: Flawless
+5 :: Epic
+6 :: Legendary

Planned Updates:
None needed, and should work for all game versions, save for future patches which potentially add more ranks. Highly unlikely.

Conflicts and Compatibility:
Should be perfect for all versions of the game, and will conflict only with mods that alter the 12 GMST strings I\'ve modified.

History:
1.0 :: Initial release, contained unnecessary junk data
1.1 :: Fixed, cleaned

Notes:
If for some reason somebody beat me to this, as my search for similar mods was brief at best, I apologize and will remove mine as soon as it\'s brought to my attention.
author: SFD
